image.caption:
Mosiac Cow
I made this mosiac cow becuase I like cows and it looks like a puzzle. It was one of the easiest assignments with Photoshop. I did that assignment without any help.

Liquified Pig
I made a pig because pigs are cute. Pigs are also not food. This assignment was not difficult. I learned about filters with that assignment.

Walking Gif
This is the first GIF I made. It was not very difficult. It took a while to get it to work on my website.

Orginal Gif
This is an orginal GIF I made. I did not know what else to do so I made a guy walking to a door.

San Francisco
This is the first thing I ever made in Photoshop. I found it super difficult because I never used Photoshop before. My friends helped me a lot with this assignment.
